import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' function Productcreen() { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { const res = await fetch(`/api/products/${id}`); const data = await res.json(); setProduct(data); }; fetchProduct(); } , []); // const product = product.find((p) => p._id === id)s return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default Productcreen
